titleStmt.title: A compe[n]dious letter which Jhon Pomerane curate of the congregation at Wittenberge sent to the faythfull christen congregation in Englande
Epistola Joannis Bugenhagii Pomerani ad anglos. English
titleStmt.author: Bugenhagen, Johann, 1485-1558.
Bale, John, 1495-1563, attributed name.

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Epistola Joannis Bugenhagii Pomerani ad anglos.
Title page border (McKerrow and Ferguson 33) is dated 1536 in the sill--STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
